descriptionHtml:
Ghorza's Armor Retexture by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3899565/?]Tru3Magic[/url]
Original Mod Author - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2118592/?]atomec[/url]

[center]


[img]http://s22.postimg.org/jh4z4ym41/image.png[/img]


Light and simple warrior(sic!)-themed retexture! Yeah!

Critique and advice is always welcome! (want something - tell me, don't be shy, I'll do it)

ENJOY! :D

[size=+1]Thanks to Slothability and hodilton for video showcase:[/size]

[youtube]mQfY9jngNyc[/youtube] [youtube]aVBfYsJ7yPU[/youtube]

[img]http://s9.postimg.org/wowdbwue7/image.png[/img]


Download and install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36459//?]Ghorza's Armor[/url] (don't forget to endorse!)

Then install my retexture. Use NMM. Really.

[img]http://s24.postimg.org/hmr97vg9h/image.png[/img]

[size=+1]Thanks to:[/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2118592/?]atomec[/url] - for being so cool and creating such great mod.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/938388/?]83Willow[/url] - for fantastic screenshots

[url=http://ttalktomesoftly.deviantart.com/]ttalktomesoftly[/url] - for nice celtic brushes.

Nexus community - without all of you I wouldn't be here.

Bethesda - for TES series.[/center]
author: Tru3Magic
